courseDetails.title: Complete Beginners Trading Strategy For Passive Income
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to Swing Trade, a Successful Forex and Stock Trading Style Followed by a Technical Analysis-Based Trading Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Swing trading is a kind of trading in which gains are sought over a few days to several weeks in a stock (or any other financial asset). Technical analysis is the main tool used by swing traders to find trading opportunities.


  • Swing trading is the practise of entering positions that can last from a few days to many months in an effort to capitalise on an expected price movement.

  • A trader who engages in swing trading is exposed to overnight and weekend risk, where the price may gap and start the next session at a significantly different price.

  • The only methodology used in this swing trading course is a very potent Price Action methodology, along with the required position management strategies.

Swing trading usually includes maintaining a long or short position for more than one trading session, although typically not for more than a few weeks or a few months. This is just a basic time range; even though some deals may extend for several months or more, the trader may still classify them as swing trades. Swing trades can also happen during a trading session, but this is an uncommon result caused by incredibly volatile circumstances.


THIS COURSE IS INTENDED FOR THOSE INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE PREPARED TO FINISH IT, AND, IMPLEMENT WHAT THEY HAVE LEARNED

REGARDS,
targetAudiences: This course is exclusively for newbies who want to learn swing trading.

courseDetails.title: MAPREDUCE - Big Data with Hands-on MapReduce
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master concepts and applications of MapReduce in Big Data
courseDetails.longDescription:
MapReduce can be defined as the sub-module of Hadoop that offer huge scalability of data spread across numerous of commodity clusters. MapReduce comprises of two things that work consecutively to process the analytics. The process in both the different parts is done in a parallel manner helping save a lot of time while working with significant data. In the traditional data analysis approach, the data was analyzed serially and MapReduce overcomes that problem.

As it’s named sound, it involves mapping and reducing process which is done by mappers and reducers. The dataset gets divided equally among different mappers and all of the processes or analyses the data in a parallel manner. Once the mapper produces the outcome, reducers come in to generate the outcome. The role of the reducer is to collect the data from all the mappers and then process their outcome to get the final result.

For instance, if Flipkart needs to find out the total sell in 2018 in Mumbai. The entire process will flow below.

  • The entire dataset will be divided into months which means the sell data of one year will be divided into 12 months like how much they made each month from which location.

  • The dataset will be then assigned to 12 mappers.

  • Each mapper will find out in which city and how of how much the goods were sold.

  • After the mappers generate the report, now it comes to the turn of reducers.

  • The reducers will grab the sell value from every month for Mumbai location.

  • Eventually, they will all sell value to generate the outcome.

In this MapReduce training course, you will learn something that is going to be the next big thing soon, generating lots of opportunities in the new future. You will learn how to work with mass data, unstructured data. Working with various kinds of data and try to get all of them on the same page anyway is what you will study here. In technical terms, you will be getting a practical insight into the working of data scientists. In addition to data processing, you will also learn to develop a program in HIVE, PIG, MapReduce, and Sqoop.

Every organization has its requirement for data analysis so it is very important to develop a customized program that can generate the desired output. You will see and learn how the sub-modules of Hadoop like PIG or HIVE could be used to reduce the complexity of the program. In addition to all those vital things, you will learn which framework should you use and in which case. By the time you come to the end of the MapReduce certification, you will be enough cognizant to play with abundant data.
targetAudiences: MapReduce is the kind of technology that needs some prior experience as data analytics to learn it efficiently. It is kind of a vast topic and hence mostly preferred by working professionals. So if we talk about the target audience. Of course, working folks will be the best audience who can opt for this MapReduce certification course to enhance their expertise. Coming to students, most of them prefer to have internships to begin their professional careers. So all the students who want to work as an intern in reputed organizations should learn MapReduce as it can give a good kick start to their career.  By using several modules taught here like HIVE or PIG, students can leverage it to make some basic projects as well. People who are working in any other domain of information technology but wants to jump in as data scientists could be the perfect audience for this MapReduce certification course as nothing is best than a person willing to learn. Though it will be a bit hard to begin the things right after changing the domain, it’s also true that it won’t take much time to have you dive deep into this technology.

courseDetails.title: Logistics & Supply Chain Management - Basics 101 to Advanced
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Logistics management, inventory management, supply chain management, production management, operational research
courseDetails.longDescription:
In simple words, Logistics can be explained as the management of the flow of things from the point of origin until the point of consumption. Logistics briefs us about purchasing goods and transporting to the final destination according to the industry standards by following rules. It deals with a complex operation with the activity of involved are

  1. Inbound transportation

  2. Outbound transportation

  3. Fleet management

  4. Warehousing

  5. Material handling

  6. Inventory management

  7. Demand planning

Logistic management is a part of supply chain management that deals in meeting the customer demand through proper planning, control and movement of storage and goods. Logistics management helps companies to reduce costs and enhance customer services by providing goods more accurately and on time.

The logistics management starts with the collection of raw material from the source and making a stock of goods. The stock is made in a huge amount and stored in the warehouses for further distribution. The whole stock is imported from companies or maybe another source available for raw material. A proper listing, sorting, and pricing of goods is done by making regular reports to sort out all the things.

A further role of the distribution of goods is done as per the customer demands and the stock is transported to different cities as per the requirement. The main advantage of doing this is that a company doesn’t have to open a manufacturing plant in all cities instead they can make stock in regions. This makes it easier to deliver the stock on time as per the requirement.

Skills will you learn in this Logistics and Supply Chain Course

This Logistics and Supply Chain Course consists of several topics that cover almost the required knowledge for a candidate to get a job. Further, the topics covered in this syllabus are given above and using that what skills you will learn are: –

  • You will be able to handle a warehouse and manage all the activities happening over there.

  • You will be able to manage the relationship with the customer.

  • You will be able to set the exact prices for goods by gathering all the information.

  • Handling all the data and generating a report of it which gives the exact calculation of imported goods and exported goods.

  • Maintaining proper records and making the MIS report as per you have taught.

  • You will be able to get all management skills to handle the team and managing employees.

  • You will be master in bargaining the goods while importing and can give good prices while exporting which gives maximum benefit to the company.
targetAudiences: Basically, for this Logistics and Supply Chain Course candidate should be an MBA student or a Practitioner who wants to develop his knowledge to get growth. Sometimes, this logistics management course is beneficial for the business people as well who want to expand their business in logistics. People who are passionately willing to work in the logistics field or warehouses can opt for the same. Because there are some locations Even fresher can opt for this Logistics and Supply Chain course if they are willing to learn and get the maximum benefit out of this by learning detailed knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Lerne Agiles Projektmanagement und Kanban mit Trello
courseDetails.shortDescription: Werde zum agilen Projektmanager! Lerne, wie Du mit Trello Deine beruflichen und privaten Projekte umsetzt.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Trello ist ein kostenloses Projektmanagement-Tool, das in der Regel für agiles Projektmanagement (z.B. Scrum oder Kanban) eingesetzt wird. Es ist allerdings sehr schnell zu lernen und zu meistern, wenn man es richtig angeht. 

Praktisch jeder kann mit Trello sehr schnell gute Erfolge erzielen. Die in diesen Kurs investierte Zeit macht sich direkt bezahlt, weil Du sofort anfängst, anders zu planen und Zeit zu sparen.

In Deinen beruflichen und privaten Projekten wirst Du in Zukunft eine ganz andere Übersicht haben, was gerade geplant ist und wer an welchen Aufgaben arbeitet. Du wirst mit Freuden Deine Aufgaben dokumentieren und kommunizieren, einfach weil es in Trello so viel Spaß macht.

Egal, ob Du im Team oder alleine Deine Projekte und Aufgaben mit Trello steuerst: Es ist das ideale Tool, um die Aufgaben vernünftig zu planen und jederzeit die Planung den aktuellen Gegebenheiten anzupassen.

Ich selbst plane meine Udemy-Kurse mit Trello und weiß dadurch immer, wo ich stehe. Bei einer Planung und Realisierung über mehrere Wochen ist das sehr hilfreich, weil man sonst schnell das Gefühl dafür verliert, ob man gut oder schlecht in der Zeit liegt.

Wenn Du einmal die Tricks kennst (und ich verrate die in der Reihenfolge, wie Du sie brauchst), dann wirst Du Trello fürs Projektmanagement und Selbstmanagement nicht mehr missen wollen!
targetAudiences: Der Kurs richtet sich an alle, die effektiver arbeiten wollen.
Projektmanagement: Trello ist ein modernes Projektmanagement-Tool, mit dem Ihr Eure Umsetzungsstärke im Projekt deutlich erhöhen könnt.
Das Gleiche gilt natürlich auch für Projektmitarbeiter - Du kannst das Tool erst einmal nur für Dich nutzen und sehen, was es bringt.
Privatleute, die ihre täglichen Aufgaben in den Griff kriegen wollen.

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Bar Graphs
courseDetails.shortDescription: Bar Graphs, Bar Charts
courseDetails.longDescription:
1. If a survey is conducted to find out the causes of illness and death among women, then how to represent the survey figures in the form of a graph and to find out which condition is the major cause of women’s ill health and death worldwide.

2. If the data on the number of girls per thousand boys in different sections of the society is given, then how to represent the information given by way of a bar graph and what conclusions can be arrived at from the graph.

3. If the data in respect of seats won by different political parties in polling outcome of state assembly elections is given, then how to draw the bar graph to represent the polling results.

4. Why Bar graph or Bar Chart is used?

5. Whether bars in the bar graph are drawn vertically or horizontally?

6. Whether any space is left between bars?

7. Whether each bar in the bar graph has an equal width?

8. Whether bars in the bar graph are adjoining to each other?

9. Whether bar graphs are simple or complex to understand?

After the collection of data, the data has to be presented in such a manner which is easily understandable. To present data, we can make use of different methods such as frequency distribution tables, bar graphs etc.
targetAudiences: Students and any individual who enjoys learning about various mathematical concepts

courseDetails.title: eBay Dropshipping Uzmanlığı ChatGPT ile: Karlı Bir İş Kurma
courseDetails.shortDescription: Adım Adım Rehber: ChatGPT ile Karlı bir eBay Dropshipping İşletmesi Kurma
courseDetails.longDescription:
Finansal Kaderinizi Ele Almaya ve Kendi Başarılı eBay İşinizin Patronu Olmaya Hazır mısınız? Daha fazla aramayın! Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile işbirliği içinde sunduğumuz kapsamlı eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimiz, size çevrimiçi pazarda hakimiyet kurmak için gerekli beceri ve stratejileri kazandırmak için burada.

Giriş

eBay, insanların çevrimiçi olarak ürün satın alıp satmasının yolunu devrim niteliğinde değiştirmiştir ve dropshipping giderek popüler bir iş modeli olarak ortaya çıkmıştır. eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimiz ile kendi evinizin rahatlığında eBay'ın gücünden yararlanabilir, a excessive startup costs yükünden kurtulabilirsiniz.

eBay Dropshipping'in Faydaları

Dropshipping, girişimci adayları için birçok avantaj sunar. eBay'ın geniş müşteri tabanını kullanarak, fiziksel envanter ihtiyacı olmadan küresel bir kitleye ulaşabilirsiniz. Doğru stratejilerle, risk ve masrafları en aza indirirken kâr potansiyelinizi en üst düzeye çıkarabilirsiniz.

Kapsamlı eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampı

Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile işbirliği içinde geliştirdiğimiz eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimiz, eBay dropshipping'in rekabetçi dünyasında başarılı olmanıza yardımcı olmak üzere tasarlanmış kapsamlı bir müfredat sunar. Bu kurs, deneyimli girişimciler ve acemiler için uygundur ve karlı bir eBay işletmesi başlatmak ve büyütmek için kanıtlanmış adımları size rehberlik eder.

Liste Optimizasyonu İçin SEO Tekniklerini Ustalaştırma

Kalabalık eBay pazarında öne çıkmak için listelerinizi en yüksek görünürlük ve karlılık için optimize etmek çok önemlidir. Kurslarımız size en yeni SEO teknik ve stratejilerini öğreterek eBay listeleme sıralamalarınızı iyileştirmenize ve daha fazla potansiyel alıcı çekmenize yardımcı olur.

eBay'in Ücret Yapısını Anlayarak Kar Marjlarını Maksimize Etme

eBay'in ücret yapısını anlamak, kâr marjlarınızı maksimize etmek için esastır. eBay'de satış yaparken dahil olan çeşitli ücretleri derinlemesine inceleyecek ve maliyetleri minimize edip kârınızı artırmak için size içgörüler ve stratejiler sağlayacağız.

Güvenilir Bir Satıcı Olma ve En İyi Dereceli Statüsüne Ulaşma

eBay'de güvenilir bir satıcı olmak ve en iyi dereceli statüsüne ulaşmak, satışlarınızı ve itibarınızı önemli ölçüde artırabilir. Size güvenilir bir satıcı olmanın sırlarını, alıcı güvenini oluşturmanın ve platformdaki başarınızı artırmak için mükemmel müşteri hizmetleri sunmanın yollarını açıklayacağız.

Maksimum Satış İçin Etkileyici eBay Listeleri Oluşturma

Etkileyici eBay listeleri oluşturmak, satışlarınız üzerinde önemli bir etki yapabilecek bir sanattır. Kurslarımız size adım adım, etkileyici ürün açıklamaları oluşturma, başlıkları ve anahtar kelimeleri optimize etme ve alıcıları çekmek ve tutarlı satışlar gerçekleştirmek için yüksek kaliteli görseller kullanma sürecinde rehberlik eder.

Mükemmel Ürün Nişi Seçme ve Dropshipping Ortaklıklarını Kullanma

eBay dropshipping'de başarılı olmak için doğru ürün nişini seçmek kritik bir öneme sahiptir. Size kârlı ürün nişlerini belirlemenize, pazar araştırması yapmanıza ve işlemlerinizi düzene sokmak ve satışlarınızı artırmak için dropshipping ortaklıklarının potansiyelini keşfetmenize yardımcı olacağız.

Ortaya Çıkan Pazar Trendlerinden Yararlanma

Ortaya çıkan pazar trendleriyle güncel kalmak, rekabette önde olmak için esastır. Size pazar trendlerini nasıl belirleyeceğinizi ve fırsatları nasıl değerlendireceğinizi, yeni ürün fırsatlarını keşfetmenizi ve eBay alıcılarının değişen taleplerine uyum sağlamak için stratejilerinizi nasıl adapte edeceğinizi öğreteceğiz.

Uzun Vadeli Başarı ve Evrilen Stratejiler

eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımız, size uzun vadeli başarı için bilgi ve beceriler sunmak üzere tasarlanmıştır. On yılı aşkın eBay uzmanlığı ile kurslarımız, çevrimiçi ticaretin sürekli değişen manzarasında uyum sağlamak ve gelişmek için en son stratejileri ve en iyi uygulamaları ile donatmanıza yardımcı olacaktır.

Kurs Gereksinimleri

eBay Dropshipping Eğitimimizi almak için gereksinimler:

  • Daha önce eBay deneyimi veya bilgisi gerekmemektedir.

  • Potansiyel satıcılar ve dropshipping ortaklarıyla iletişime geçme isteği.

  • eBay'da nasıl satış yapılacağına dair temel bir anlayış.

  • İnternet erişimi olan bir bilgisayar veya cihaz.

  • Alternatif, ancak son derece etkili stratejileri benimsemeye açık bir zihniyet.

Bu Kursu Kimler Almalı

Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımız, eBay'in platformunun gücünü kullanmak ve dropshipping dünyasına girmek isteyen bireyler için tasarlanmıştır. Bu kurs, şunlar için uygundur:

  • Girişimci Adayları: Kendi çevrimiçi işinizi başlatmanın hayalini kuruyorsanız ve eBay'in erişim ve potansiyelinden yararlanmak istiyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre. Girişimcilik yolculuğunuza başlamak için gerekli bilgi ve becerileri sağlayacağız.

  • Dropshipping'e İlgisi Olan Bireyler: Dropshipping, çevrimiçi bir iş başlatmanın düşük riskli ve maliyet etkin bir yolunu sunar. Dropshipping'e yeni başlıyorsanız veya biraz deneyiminiz varsa, size güvenilir tedarikçiler bulma, envanter yönetimi ve siparişleri sorunsuz bir şekilde yerine getirme sürecinden rehberlik edecek bu kurs sizin için idealdir.

  • Esneklik ve Konfor Arayanlar: Evden veya internet bağlantısı olan herhangi bir yerden çalışma özgürlüğünü değerli buluyorsanız, eBay dropshipping size istediğiniz esnekliği ve konforu sağlayabilir. Kurslarımız size esnek bir yaşam tarzının avantajlarını yaşarken sürdürülebilir bir eBay işi nasıl kurulacağını öğretecektir.

  • Ek Gelir Elde Etmek İsteyenler: Mevcut gelirinizi desteklemek veya yeni bir gelir akışı yaratmak istiyorsanız, eBay dropshipping kârlı bir girişim olabilir. Size kazançlarınızı artırmak ve eBay işinizden en iyi şekilde yararlanmak için kanıtlanmış taktikler ve stratejiler paylaşacağız.

eBay'da Tam Potansiyelinizi Ortaya Çıkarın, Satış Sanatında Uzmanlaşın ve Finansal Başarıya Giden Yolunuzu Açın! Şimdi harekete geçin ve Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımıza kaydolun.

SSS

eBay dropshipping’i yarı zamanlı bir iş olarak yapabilir miyim?

Kesinlikle! eBay dropshipping, kendi programınıza göre çalışma esnekliği sunar. Yarı zamanlı bir satıcı olarak başlayabilir ve mevcudiyetiniz ve hedefleriniz doğrultusunda işinizi ölçeklendirebilirsiniz.

eBay dropshipping'de başarılı olmak için teknik becerilere ihtiyaç duyar mıyım?

Hayır, eBay dropshipping'de başarılı olmak için ileri düzeyde teknik becerilere ihtiyaç duymazsınız.

Kurslarımız sizi sürecin her adımında yönlendirecek, hatta bir başlangıç seviyesindeyseniz bile sizi destekleyecektir.

Kurs ne kadar sürer ve ne kadar zaman ayırmalıyım?

Bu kurs, kendi hızınızda ilerlemenize olanak sağlayan esnek bir yapıya sahiptir. Genellikle, öğrencilerimiz kursu 8-12 hafta içinde tamamlamaktadır. Başarıya ulaşmak için haftada en az 5-7 saat ayırmanızı öneririz, ancak bu tamamen sizin hızınıza ve programınıza bağlıdır.


Sonuç

eBay'in gücünü kilidini açın ve eBay satış patronu olarak kazançlı bir yolculuğa çıkın. Okyanusi Üniversitesi ile kapsamlı eBay Dropshipping Eğitim Kampımız, eBay dropshipping'in rekabetçi dünyasında gelişmeniz için gereken bilgi, stratejiler ve becerileri size sunar. İster bir başlangıç seviyesinde olun, ister deneyimli bir girişimci, bu kurs sizi başarılı bir eBay işi başlatmak ve büyütmek için gereken araçlarla donatacaktır. Finansal geleceğinizi dönüştürme fırsatını kaçırmayın. Şimdi kaydolun ve bir eBay satış patronu olma yolunda ilk adımınızı atın!
targetAudiences: Kendi işlerini kurmak ve e-ticaret ve dropshipping sektörüne ilgi duyan bireyler, bu kursta büyük bir değer bulacaktır.
eBay Satıcıları: eBay'de zaten bir varlığı olan ancak iş modelini dropshipping'i de içerecek şekilde genişletmek isteyenler, kurs içeriğinden büyük fayda görecektir.
E-ticaret Tutkunları: Aktif bir işleri olmasa bile e-ticaret konusunda ilgisi olan herkes, eBay'deki dropshipping modeli hakkında kapsamlı bir anlayış kazanacaktır.
Kariyer Değiştirenler: Çevrimiçi bir iş alanına kariyer değişikliği yapmayı arayan kişiler, içeriği son derece uygulanabilir ve pratik bulacaktır.
Dijital Göçebeler: Esnek ve konumdan bağımsız bir iş isteyenler, eBay'de dropshipping modelini uygun bulacaktır.

courseDetails.title: SHRM-CP Certification Professional Exam Test [August 2023]
courseDetails.shortDescription: SHRM CP Exam Preparation - SHRM CP Certification Exam Guide, 6 Complete Practice Tests, Detailed Answer Explanations
courseDetails.longDescription:
SHRM-CP Certification Professional Exam Test - Updated on August 2023.

We take pride in offering monthly course updates to our valued students, ensuring that you have continuous access to the freshest and most relevant material. By enrolling in our courses, you'll benefit from regularly refreshed content, providing you with the latest insights and up-to-date industry practices. Stay at the forefront of your field with our commitment to providing you with ongoing, cutting-edge education that empowers your success.

What is SHRM?

The SHRM Certified Professional (SHRM-CP) is a certification offered by the Society for Human Resource Management (SHRM), the world's largest HR professional organization. This certification is designed for HR professionals engaged in the operational aspects of HR management. Demonstrate the ability to apply HR best practices, knowledge and skills in the workplace.

The SHRM-CP certification is particularly suited to early and mid-career HR professionals responsible for implementing policies and strategies, providing HR services, and performing operational HR functions.

To obtain the SHRM-CP certification, applicants must meet the following eligibility requirements:

  • HR-related experience: This is determined by your level of education and professional HR experience. For example, a bachelor's degree requires at least two years of professional HR experience, while a master's degree requires only one year of HR experience. High school diploma holders must have at least 4 years of professional HR experience.

  • Pass the SHRM-CP Exam: This exam is a comprehensive computer-based test that assesses your knowledge and skills in the HR competency and knowledge areas covered by the SHRM Competencies and Body of Knowledge (SHRM BoCK).

After earning the SHRM-CP certification, you must maintain your certification by completing professional development credits (PDCs) through continuing learning, professional performance, and leadership activities. You must re certify every three years by accumulating a minimum of 60 PDCs or by retaking and passing the SHRM-CP exam.

The SHRM-CP certification is a valuable credential that helps HR professionals advance their careers, increase their credibility, and demonstrate their commitment to staying current with the latest HR practices and trends.


SHRM-CP Exam:

The Society for Human Resource Management-Certified Professional (SHRM-CP) exam is a computer-based test designed to assess a candidate's knowledge, skills, and competency in human resource management. The exam covers a variety of HR-related topics as outlined in the SHRM Competencies and Body of Knowledge (SHRM BoCK).

The SHRM-CP exam consists of:

  • Test format: The test contains 160 multiple-choice questions, of which 130 are scored and 30 are unscored pretest questions. These pre-exam questions are spread throughout the exam and are indistinguishable from graded questions.

  • Exam Duration: Candidates have 4 hours to complete the exam.

  • Content: The exam covers two fundamental areas the HR knowledge area and the HR competency area. Knowledge domains are grouped into three categories: People (Talent Acquisition and Retention, Employee Engagement, Learning and Development), Organization (Structure, Culture, Efficiency and Change Management), and Workplace (Employment Law, Risk Management and Employee Relations). ). Competencies include leadership and exploration, ethical practice, business acumen, relationship management, counseling, critical evaluation, global and cultural effectiveness, and communication.

  • Scoring: The SHRM-CP exam is scored using a scaled scoring system that compares each candidate's score to a predetermined passing score. The passing score is set by SHRM using a rigorous statistical process. Candidates receive a detailed score report summarizing their performance in each domain, along with a pass or fail status.

To prepare for the SHRM-CP exam, candidates can use a variety of resources, such as the SHRM Learning System, which offers comprehensive self-paced study programs. Applicants can also participate in SHRM seminars, online courses, and local chapter study groups. To prepare for the exam successfully, we recommend studying the SHRM BoCK, reviewing the HR literature, and staying up to date on employment law and HR best practices.

HR professionals who pass the exam and earn the SHRM-CP certification must earn 60 Professional Development Credits (PDC) or retake the exam to recertify every three years.


Introducing the SHRM CP Exam Preparation - SHRM CP Certification Exam Guide, 6 Complete Practice Tests, Detailed Answer Explanations!

Are you an aspiring HR professional looking to get ahead in your career? Look no further! Our comprehensive guide, "SHRM CP Exam Preparation - SHRM CP Certification Exam Guide, 6 Complete Practice Tests, Detailed Answer Explanations," is the perfect tool to help you succeed on your journey to obtaining the SHRM-CP certification.


Why choose our guide?

Our expertly crafted study guide provides you with the following features to ensure your success:

  1. In-depth coverage of essential HR topics: We've got you covered with thorough explanations of critical HR knowledge domains and competencies, as outlined in the SHRM Body of Competency and Knowledge (SHRM BoCK).

  2. Six complete practice tests: Gain valuable test-taking experience with six full-length practice exams designed to closely resemble the actual SHRM-CP exam format and difficulty level.

  3. Detailed answer explanations: Understand the reasoning behind each answer with our step-by-step explanations, helping you not only learn the correct response but also develop a deeper understanding of the underlying concepts.

  4. Test-taking strategies and tips: Build your confidence and enhance your test-taking skills with our expert advice on how to approach the exam and tackle even the trickiest questions.

Ready to ace the SHRM-CP exam? Take the first step today!

Don't miss this opportunity to invest in your professional growth and success. Give yourself the best chance at acing the SHRM-CP exam by trying out our practice tests and leveraging the valuable insights provided in our study guide.

Remember, practice makes perfect! The more you familiarize yourself with the exam format and content, the better equipped you'll be to handle whatever the SHRM-CP throws your way. So, go ahead and take the plunge – try our practice tests and unlock the door to a rewarding and successful career in human resources.

Good luck, and happy studying!

With each update, you can expect to access new questions, providing you with fresh opportunities to enhance your skills and knowledge. Career changers exploring the SHRM-CP path: Individuals considering a career change to human resources will find this course beneficial in preparing for the SHRM Certified Professional (SHRM-CP) exam and gaining a comprehensive understanding of the HR field.

International HR professionals pursuing SHRM-CP certification: HR professionals from around the world who want to expand their knowledge of US-based HR practices and earn the globally recognized SHRM Certified Professional (SHRM-CP) credential will benefit from this course.

HR consultants seeking SHRM-CP validation: Independent HR consultants looking to demonstrate their expertise and credibility to clients by obtaining the SHRM Certified Professional (SHRM-CP) certification will find this course invaluable.

HR educators aiming to incorporate SHRM-CP principles: Educators teaching human resources or related subjects can use this course to stay current with the latest HR trends and practices, ensuring they effectively incorporate SHRM Certified Professional (SHRM-CP) concepts into their curriculum.

courseDetails.title: Overcome Cryptocurrency Scams | Learn Bitcoin Profit Secrets
courseDetails.shortDescription: Beginners Complete Guide on How to Overcome Cryptocurrency Scams and the Complete Bitcoin Profit Secrets from Scratch
courseDetails.longDescription:
Scammers are using social media to perpetuate giveaway scams. They post screenshots of forged messages from companies and executives promoting a giveaway with hyperlinks to fraudulent websites. Fake accounts will then respond to these posts affirming the scam as legitimate. The fraudulent websites will then ask that you “verify” your address by sending cryptocurrency to the scam giveaway.

How To Avoid Cryptocurrency Scams

Scammers are always finding new ways to steal your money using cryptocurrency. One sure sign of a scam is anyone who says you have to pay by cryptocurrency. In fact, anyone who tells you to pay by wire transfer, gift card, or cryptocurrency is a scammer. Of course, if you pay, there’s almost no way to get that money back. Which is what the scammers are counting on. Here are some cryptocurrency scams to watch out for.

Investment and business opportunity scams

  • Some companies promise that you can earn lots of money in a short time and achieve financial freedom.

  • Some scammers tell you to pay in cryptocurrency for the right to recruit others into a program. If you do, they say, you’ll get recruitment rewards paid in cryptocurrency. The more cryptocurrency you pay, the more money they promise you’ll make. But these are all fake promises, and false guarantees.

  • Some scammers start with unsolicited offers from supposed “investment managers.” These scammers say they can help you grow your money if you give them the cryptocurrency you’ve bought. But once you log in to the “investment account” they opened, you’ll find that you can’t withdraw your money unless you pay fees.

  • Some scammers send unsolicited job offers to help recruit cryptocurrency investors, sell cryptocurrency, mine cryptocurrency, or help with converting cash to bitcoin.

  • Some scammers list scam jobs on job websites. They’ll promise you a job (for a fee), but end up taking your money or personal information.

Look for claims like these to help you spot the companies and people to avoid:

  • Scammers guarantee that you’ll make money. If they promise you’ll make a profit, that’s a scam. Even if there’s a celebrity endorsement or testimonials. (Those are easily faked.)

  • Scammers promise big payouts with guaranteed returns. Nobody can guarantee a set return, say, double your money. Much less in a short time.

  • Scammers promise free money. They’ll promise it in cash or cryptocurrency, but free money promises are always fake.

  • Scammers make big claims without details or explanations. Smart business people want to understand how their investment works, and where their money is going. And good investment advisors want to share that information.

Before you invest, check it out. Research online for the name of the company and the cryptocurrency name, plus words like “review,” “scam,” or “complaint.” See what others are saying. And read more about other common investment scams.

Blackmail emails

Scammers will often send emails that say they have embarrassing or compromising photos, videos, or personal information about you. Then, they threaten to make it public unless you pay them in cryptocurrency. Don’t do it. This is blackmail and a criminal extortion attempt. Report it to the FBI immediately.

Social media scams

If you read a tweet, text, email, or get a message on social media that tells you to send cryptocurrency, it’s a scam. That’s true even if the message came from someone you know, or was posted by a celebrity you follow. Their social media accounts might have been hacked.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to profit in Bitcoin and overcome cryptocurrency scams online

Sample TypeScript Interview Question

Question: What is the default access modifier for members of a class in TypeScript?

Option 1: Private

Option 2: Public

Option 3: Protected

Option 4: Internal

Correct Option: 2

Explanation: In TypeScript, the default access modifier for members of a class is public. This means that by default, all members of a class are accessible from outside the class. If you do not specify an access modifier for a member of a class, it will be considered public. To make a member private, you can use the private keyword in front of the member declaration. Private members are only accessible from within the class and cannot be accessed from outside the class. [referance ulr]

The practice tests covers a wide range of topics, from basic Angular concepts to advanced topics such as Observables, Pipes, and Dependency Injection.


Angular Sample Question 1:

What is the difference between ngIf and ngShow/ngHide directives in Angular?

  • Option 1: The ngFor directive is used to handle user events in Angular.

  • Option 2: The ngFor directive is used for styling HTML elements in Angular.

  • Option 3: The ngFor directive is used to bind data to a template and repeat HTML elements based on an iterable.

  • Option 4: The ngFor directive is used to declare dependencies in Angular.

Correct Answer: Option 3

Explanation:

The ngFor directive in Angular is used to iterate over a collection and generate HTML elements dynamically. It takes an iterable (such as an array) and repeats a portion of HTML code for each item in the collection. Within the ngFor loop, you can access properties and methods of the current item using a local variable. The ngFor directive is commonly used to display lists, tables, or any other repeating elements in Angular templates.

Learn more: [learn more url here]


Angular Sample Question 2:

What is an observable in Angular and how is it used?

  • Option 1: An observable in Angular is a mechanism used to manage server-side logic.

  • Option 2: An observable in Angular is a class used to style HTML elements.

  • Option 3: An observable in Angular is a component used to handle user events.

  • Option 4: An observable in Angular is an asynchronous data stream that can be observed and processed using operators.

Correct Answer: Option 4

Explanation:

In Angular, an observable is a powerful data handling mechanism based on the Reactive Programming paradigm. It represents an asynchronous data stream that can emit multiple values over time. Observables are used extensively in Angular for handling asynchronous operations such as making HTTP requests, handling user events, or managing data streams. Observables can be combined, transformed, filtered, and subscribed to using operators, allowing for efficient data manipulation and handling. They provide a convenient way to handle asynchronous operations, manage data streams, and react to changes in the application.

Learn more: [learn more url here]

The unique reasons for taking this course are:

  1. Complete, Concise, Confident Overview of advanced scrum techniques - I cover the theory and give you examples of how the theory is used in industry.

  2. Confidence in using advanced scrum techniques - In a very simple way, I teach you the fundamentals of the scrum of scrums program management technique and how to influence and coach others with solid explanations of scrum in industry without going into a class room or spending $£1000..

  3. You get to ask me questions and see me respond to every single one of them thoughtfully!

Includes Narration from Buddy Hatton, Ted R. Brown, Kevin Kollins and Scott Clem.

What is Scrum?

Scrum is a simple method for managing and completing even the most complex project. Based on my experience, it is the number 1 way to complete projects or programs (programmes) on time while delivering value for any business or user. Scrum is the most popular framework within agile project management.

Who should take is course?

Whether you are a SCRUM MASTER, PROGRAM MANAGER, TEAM MEMBER,  OR PRODUCT OWNER OR Software Testing Manager.

or simply someone who wants the answer to the question “how do I take scrum to the next level", this is definitely the class is for you.

If you are studying for your PMP qualification from the PMI, then this class is also for you..

This class will help you to ace the "on the job" experience questions in the Professional Scrum Master (PSM) exams .

What will I learn?

In this class you will learn:

  • Concise overview of advanced scrum techniques- Including how to run multiple scrum teams, how to explain, coach and influence others to use scrum and how to become a scrum master in 7 simple steps.

  • The facts based on real industry experience and research - The correct terminology and use of scrum is essential to mastering it. My experience in industry and research into the topic has been used to give you a solid grounding in the most concise way possible.

  • scrum of scrums program management/ co-ordination techniques - I give you a complete overview of scrum of scrums as used in the business work place without having to do a face to face course saving you hundreds if not thousands of dollars.

The course is video based with no supporting document necessary.

How is the course structured?

Each section features an overview of a particular aspect of advanced scrum techniques such as it's Origin and how it progresses to more advanced methods such as how to run multiple scrum teams, how to explain, coach and influence others to use scrum and how to become a scrum master in 7 simple steps.

Examples are included throughout the course wirh excellent quality video and audio. All is based real world experience.

Inspired by God, the Bible, my mother and father, Ken Schwaber, Jeff Sutherland.

courseDetails.title: French proverbs for intermediate students
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understand both language and culture in French
courseDetails.longDescription:
Proverbs are short and pithy statements. They offer life advice, wisdom or a general truth. Proverbs are often so common that native speakers would use them in conversations without even realizing it. A proverb can be a shortcut in explaining something. They communicate an accepted message in a few well-worn and well-known words.

Illustrating a point to be made, proverbs are oftentimes metaphorical or symbolic in nature. Some proverbs can be reflective of a specific culture. However, the majority is widely embraced and quite often passed down through generations and generations. In fact, some of the earliest recorded proverbs date back to 2000 BC. Even to the ancient Sumerians who would write them on stone tablets.

A few examples:

  • An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
    Chaque jour une pomme conserve son homme.

  • Barking dogs seldom bite. 
    Chien qui aboie ne mord pas.

  • As you make your bed, so you must lie.
    Comme on fait son lit, on se couche.

  • You can't teach an old dog new tricks.
    Ce n'est pas aux vieux singes qu'on apprend à faire des grimaces.

  • When in doubt, leave it out. 
    Dans le doute, abstiens-toi.

A key element in learning a language and a culture is proverbs. It's only when you're able to use proverbs properly that you can really set yourself apart and be considered a professional or even a native speaker.

Set the bar a bit higher and become an expert in French with these common proverbs, you'll amaze a few people along the way.
targetAudiences: Students who want to go from intermediate French to professional

Python Sample Question 1

What is the difference between lists and tuples?

  1. Lists are mutable and tuples are immutable.

  2. Lists are ordered and tuples are unordered.

  3. Lists can contain elements of different data types and tuples cannot.

Correct Option: 1

Explanation:

The main difference between lists and tuples in Python is their mutability. Lists are mutable, meaning their elements can be changed, added, or removed. Tuples, on the other hand, are immutable, and their elements cannot be modified once defined. Lists are also ordered, while tuples are ordered collections. Finally, lists can contain elements of different data types, whereas tuples maintain elements of the same or different data types.

Learn more at: learn more url here


Python Sample Question 2

What are metaclasses in Python?

  1. Metaclasses in Python are classes used to define the behavior of other classes.

  2. Metaclasses in Python are classes that inherit from multiple base classes.

  3. Metaclasses in Python are classes that allow dynamic attribute assignment.

  4. Metaclasses in Python are classes used to implement abstract base classes.

Correct Option: 1

Explanation:

Metaclasses in Python are classes that define the behavior and structure of other classes. They provide a way to modify the creation and behavior of classes themselves. Metaclasses are responsible for creating classes, just as classes are responsible for creating instances. They allow you to customize class creation, modify class attributes and methods, and perform various operations on classes. Metaclasses can be useful for implementing advanced patterns, such as creating singleton classes, enforcing coding standards, or automatically adding behavior to classes at runtime. However, metaclasses can be complex and should be used judiciously, as they can introduce additional complexity and may not be necessary for most applications.

Learn more at: learn more url here

Enroll in this 360 question test today and take the first step toward becoming a Certified Facility Manager!

Here is some additional information about the CFM exam:

  • The exam is based on the IFMA's Facility Management Body of Knowledge (FMBoK) and covers the following competency areas: operations and maintenance, project management, finance and business, leadership and strategy, and sustainability.

  • The exam is administered through Prometric testing centers, which are located in various cities throughout the world.

  • The cost of the exam varies depending on whether the candidate is an IFMA member or non-member. As of March 2023, the cost for IFMA members is $825, and the cost for non-members is $1,025.

  • To be eligible to take the exam, candidates must meet certain requirements, including a minimum of four years of facility management experience and a bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience.

  • The passing score for the CFM exam is 75%. Candidates who pass the exam will receive a certificate indicating their certification as a Certified Facility Manager.

  • If a candidate does not pass the exam on their first attempt, they may retake the exam after a waiting period of 90 days. However, they must pay the full exam fee again for each attempt.

Overall, the CFM exam is a rigorous test of a candidate's facility management knowledge and skills. Earning the CFM certification can be a valuable credential for facility managers looking to advance their careers and demonstrate their expertise in the field.

Vue JS Sample Question 1

What is the purpose of v-for directive?

  1. To loop through an array or object and render elements based on each item.

  2. To create a for loop in JavaScript.

  3. To iterate over a Vue instance and bind values to the elements..

  4. To generate unique keys for list rendering.

Correct Option: 1

Explanation:

The v-for directive in Vue.js is used to loop through an array or object and render elements based on each item. It allows developers to dynamically generate content based on data. With v-for, you can iterate over arrays, objects, or the results of method calls and bind values to the generated elements. For more details and examples, you can refer to the Vue.js documentation on list rendering: url here.


Vue JS Sample Question 2

How do you achieve a conditional group of elements?

  1. By using the v-if directive with a wrapper element around the group of elements.

  2. By using the v-show directive with a wrapper element around the group of elements.

  3. By using the v-for directive with a wrapper element around the group of elements.

  4. By using the v-else directive with a wrapper element around the group of elements.

Correct Option: 1

Explanation:

In Vue.js, you can achieve a conditional group of elements by using the v-if directive with a wrapper element around the group of elements. The v-if directive conditionally renders the entire group of elements based on the truthiness of the condition. If the condition is true, the elements will be rendered; otherwise, they will be skipped. For more information, you can refer to the Vue.js documentation on conditional rendering: url here.


Vue JS Sample Question 3

What are props in Vue.js?

  1. Props are custom attributes that allow data to be passed from a parent component to its child components.

  2. Props are properties defined in CSS.

  3. Props are methods defined in a Vue component.

  4. Props are built-in HTML attributes.

Correct Option: 1

Explanation:

Props in Vue.js are custom attributes that allow data to be passed from a parent component to its child components. By defining props in a component, you can specify the data that the parent component can provide to the child component. Props are read-only in the child component and cannot be directly modified. They are useful for creating reusable components and facilitating communication between components. For more details and examples, you can refer to the Vue.js documentation on props: url here.

Sample Question 1:

What is the difference between Shadow DOM and Virtual DOM?

1. Shadow DOM is a browser feature, while Virtual DOM is a React feature

2. Shadow DOM is used for server-side rendering, while Virtual DOM is used for client-side rendering

3. Shadow DOM is used for styling and encapsulation, while Virtual DOM is used for performance optimization

4. There is no difference


Correct Answer

1. Shadow DOM is a browser feature, while Virtual DOM is a React feature


Explanation

Shadow DOM and Virtual DOM are two different concepts. Shadow DOM is a browser feature that allows developers to encapsulate styles and markup within components. Virtual DOM, on the other hand, is a React feature that allows for performance optimization by minimizing changes to the actual DOM.

[Reference Link]



Sample Question 2:

What is JSX?

1. A testing framework

2. A JavaScript syntax extension

3. A new programming language

4. A design pattern


Correct Answer

2. A JavaScript syntax extension


Explanation

JSX is a JavaScript syntax extension that allows developers to write HTML-like code in JavaScript. JSX is not required to use React, but it is commonly used because it makes writing and managing UI components easier.

[Reference Link]

What is Docker?

Docker is a widely used containerization platform that allows developers to build, package, and deploy applications as self-sufficient and portable containers. Containerization is the process of bundling an application along with all its dependencies, libraries, and configuration files into a single, lightweight and standardized package, which can run consistently across different environments.

Docker provides a complete ecosystem for managing containers, including a container runtime, a container registry, and a command-line interface. Container runtime is the software that enables the creation, management, and execution of containers. The container registry is a centralized repository for storing and sharing container images, while the command-line interface provides developers with a simple and powerful way to manage their containers.

Docker containers are designed to be isolated from the host system and other containers, providing enhanced security and scalability for applications. With Docker, developers can easily package their applications into containers, which can be deployed on any infrastructure, including cloud platforms, virtual machines, or bare-metal servers.

Docker simplifies the process of building, packaging, and deploying applications by providing a complete containerization platform that is flexible, scalable, and easy to use. It has become an essential tool for modern software development and deployment, empowering developers to create and deploy applications faster and more reliably.


Enroll in our Docker interview questions and answers course today, and take your Docker skills to the next level!

courseDetails.title: Beyond Jupyter Notebooks
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build your own Data science platform with Docker & Python
courseDetails.longDescription:
Interactive notebooks like Jupyter have become more and more popular in the recent past and build the core of many data scientist’s workplace. Being accessed via web browser they allow scientists to easily structure their work by combining code and documentation. Yet notebooks often lead to isolated and disposable analysis artefacts. Keeping the computation inside those notebooks does not allow for convenient concurrent model training, model exposure or scheduled model retraining.

Those issues can be addressed by taking advantage of recent developments in the discipline of software engineering. Over the past years containerization became the technology of choice for crafting and deploying applications. Building a data science platform that allows for easy access (via notebooks), flexibility and reproducibility (via containerization) combines the best of both worlds and addresses Data Scientist’s hidden needs.
targetAudiences: Any level of data scientists that want to accelerate their capabilities
Open Source Lover ❤️
Pythonistas interested in Docker

courseDetails.title: Make your Own Dapp Step by Step
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Smart contract and Dapp development Practices. Build your own Dapp based on smart contracts.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the "Building Your Own Decentralized Application (DApp): A Step-by-Step Guide" course! In this comprehensive course, you will learn how to design, develop, and deploy your very own decentralized application (DApp) on a blockchain platform.

DApps have a wide range of applications across various industries, including finance, supply chain management, gaming, social media, decentralized finance (DeFi), and more. They enable new business models and opportunities by removing intermediaries, reducing costs, and empowering users with control over their data and assets.

Developing a DApp involves a combination of frontend and backend development. The frontend is responsible for creating the user interface and interacting with the blockchain through specialized libraries like Web3.js. The backend consists of smart contract development, which involves writing code to define the application's logic and behavior on the blockchain.

As DApps continue to evolve, scalability and usability challenges are being addressed through solutions like layer 2 protocols, sidechains, and improved user experience designs. The future of DApps holds potential for increased adoption, interoperability between different blockchains, and integration with emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and the Internet of Things (IoT).

The course is designed for developers, entrepreneurs, and enthusiasts who are interested in building decentralized applications and leveraging the power of blockchain technology. No prior knowledge of blockchain or programming is required, but a basic understanding of web development concepts will be helpful.

By the end of this course, you will have gained the knowledge and practical skills necessary to build and deploy your own decentralized application. Join us on this exciting journey to unlock the potential of blockchain technology and revolutionize the way applications are built and operated!
targetAudiences: Learners starting their programming/development journey in web3.

courseDetails.title: The Complete Biology Respiration in Plants |  Glycolysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Glycolysis Pathway for ATP production. Enzymes Involved during the process.
courseDetails.longDescription:
The NEW course with everything you need to know about Respiration in Plants | Glycolysis and learn deep understanding of Glycolysis is the process in which glucose is broken down to produce energy. It produces two molecules of pyruvate, ATP, NADH and water. The process takes place in the cytoplasm of a cell and does not require oxygen. It occurs in both aerobic and anaerobic organisms.

Glycolysis has ten steps, and depending on your interests—and the classes you’re taking—you may want to know the details of all of them. However, you may also be looking for a greatest hits version of glycolysis, something that highlights the key steps and principles without tracing the fate of every single atom. Let’s start with a simplified version of the pathway that does just that.

In organisms that perform cellular respiration, glycolysis is the first stage of this process. However, glycolysis doesn’t require oxygen, and many anaerobic organisms—organisms that do not use oxygen—also have this pathway.

Suppose that we gave one molecule of glucose to you and one molecule of glucose to Lactobacillus acidophilus—the friendly bacterium that turns milk into yogurt. What would you and the bacterium do with your respective glucose molecules?

Glycolysis has ten steps, and depending on your interests—and the classes you’re taking—you may want to know the details of all of them. However, you may also be looking for a greatest hits version of glycolysis, something that highlights the key steps and principles without tracing the fate of every single atom. Let’s start with a simplified version of the pathway that does just that.
targetAudiences: Biology enthusiast.
Beginners in Biology.

courseDetails.title: JavaScript MasterClass
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Fundamentals
courseDetails.longDescription:
This JavaScript Fundamentals course is designed to provide you with a solid foundation in JavaScript programming. Whether you're a beginner or have some prior experience, this course will take you through the fundamental concepts and techniques of JavaScript programming.

The course begins with an introduction to the structure of JavaScript code, teaching you how to write clean and organized code that is easy to read and maintain. You will learn about variables and how to declare and assign values to them. We will also cover the importance of using strict mode and how it helps in writing more reliable code.

Next, we dive into the world of data types in JavaScript. You will learn about primitive data types such as strings, numbers, booleans, and the special value "null" and "undefined." We will explore how to work with these data types, perform operations on them, and understand type conversions.

Interaction is a crucial aspect of JavaScript programming, and in this course, we will cover various methods to interact with the user. You will learn how to prompt the user for input, display messages, and handle user interactions through events.

Conditional statements are essential in programming, and JavaScript offers powerful conditional constructs. We will explore if-else statements, allowing you to make decisions based on certain conditions. Additionally, we will cover switch statements, which provide an elegant way to handle multiple possible outcomes.

Functions are the building blocks of JavaScript applications, and in this course, we will dive deep into this topic. You will learn how to define and call functions, pass arguments, and return values. We will also cover function expressions and arrow functions.

By the end of this course, you will have a strong understanding of JavaScript fundamentals. You will be able to write well-structured code, declare and manipulate variables, use conditional statements effectively, and create reusable functions. Whether you're interested in web development, game development, or any other JavaScript-based project, this course will provide you with the necessary skills to get started.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in JavaScript

courseDetails.title: Introduction to R for Environmental Data Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to visualize average annual temperature data through graphs created by ggplot2 in R!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Interested in climate change, programming, or data visualization? Then, this course is for you!

In this course, you will learn how to graph climate data using the R programming language in Google Colab! Specifically, we'll be looking at how the average annual air temperature changes as the years go by (the x-axis will be the year, and the y-axis will be the average annual temperature). We'll use San Diego climate data from the National Centers for the Environmental Information (NCEI) Global Summary of the Year weather database, but you're welcome to use data from any city. To approximate missing values in the dataset, we'll use linear interpolation and install the necessary packages such as tidyverse, ggplot2, readr, and imputeTS. We'll make basic graphs with ggplot2, including features such as the axes, data points, and lines. Then, we'll make more aesthetic and visual graphs by adding layers, or geoms, with different features such as a title, axes labels, gradient color scale, locally estimated scatterplot smoother, and more! Next, we'll make the graphs with the Fahrenheit system instead of Celsius using a math equation to convert the temperature values. Finally, you'll be provided with some additional resources regarding climate change. No programming experience is needed.
targetAudiences: Programmers curious about the intersection of environmental science, coding, and data science/visualization.

courseDetails.title: Business Charts mit Excel

courseDetails.longDescription:
Allgemein

In den meisten Fällen werden Excel-Diagramme mit zu viel Dekoration erstellt. Hier ein Clipart, dort eine Legende, etc. Bedauerlicherweise werden somit mehr Probleme als Nutzen kreiert. Was gut gemeint ist, schafft mehr Ablehnung als Erfolge.

Die Excel-Diagramme, oder Business Charts sollten aussagekräftig sein und beim Empfänger schnell Aufmerksamkeit bekommen, damit die entsprechenden Massnahmen vom Management eingeleitet werden können.

Geschieht dies nicht, kann es schnell passieren, dass Abweichungen und finanzielle Probleme auf der Strecke bleiben.


Ich selbst arbeite seit über 20 Jahren im Controlling und habe für nationale und internationale Unternehmen gearbeitet. Sie sind bei mir also was das Thema Controlling und Excel betrifft in guten Händen.

Sie werden lernen, wie Sie mit Excel professionelle Diagramme erstellen können und worauf Sie achten müssen.

Der Kurs ist ideal für Controller, die Ihr Wissen im Berichtswesen und Reporting ausbauen möchten.

Auch wenn Sie nicht aus dem Controlling kommen, lohnt sich dieser Online-Kurs für Sie, wenn Sie in Ihrem Job Auswertungen mit Excel erstellen.


Inhalt

In diesem Online-Kurs lernen Sie:

  • wie Werte im Linien-Diagramm richtig dargestellt werden

  • ABC Analyse mit Pfeilen

  • Break Even Point Diagramm mit rot/grüner Fläche

  • Summenwerte im gestapelten Säulendiagramm

courseDetails.title: .Net ile Elasticsearch Entegrasyonu
courseDetails.shortDescription: Saniyeler İçinde Arama: .Net & Elasticsearch ile Veri Hızlandırma
courseDetails.longDescription:
Veri biliminin geleceği, büyük veri setlerini hızlı ve etkin bir şekilde işleyebilme yeteneğine bağlıdır. ".Net ile Elasticsearch Entegrasyonu: Saniyeler İçinde Veri Arama" kursu, tam da bu hedefi gerçekleştirmek için tasarlanmıştır.

Bu kurs, .Net 7 ve Entity Framework kullanarak Elasticsearch'ü nasıl entegre edeceğinizi adım adım öğretir. Herhangi bir veritabanından veri aktarmayı ve büyük veri setleri üzerinde hızlı ve etkili aramalar yapmayı öğreneceksiniz. Dahası, Docker kullanarak Elasticsearch image'ını nasıl ayağa kaldıracağınıza dair pratik bir anlayış kazanacaksınız.

Kurs boyunca, Elasticsearch'ün özelliklerini ve kullanımını derinlemesine anlamanız için gereken tüm bilgi ve becerileri edineceksiniz. Hem teorik bilgiyi hem de pratik uygulamayı birleştirerek, Elasticsearch'ü hızlı ve etkin bir şekilde nasıl kullanacağınızı öğreneceksiniz.

Ayrıca, kurs boyunca veri aktarımı süreçlerini anlamanızı ve optimize etmenizi sağlayacak birçok farklı örnekle karşılaşacaksınız. Bu örnekler ve uygulamalar, elinizdeki veriyi en etkili şekilde nasıl kullanabileceğinizi anlamanızı sağlar.

Her seviyeden yazılımcı ve veri bilimcisi için ideal olan bu kurs, büyük veri setlerinde hızlı ve etkin arama yeteneğinizi geliştirirken aynı zamanda .Net ve Elasticsearch yeteneklerinizi de artırmanıza yardımcı olacak. 1 saatlik yoğunlaştırılmış eğitimle, kısa sürede çok şey öğrenme fırsatı yakalayacaksınız.

Eğer büyük veri setleriyle çalışmayı, hızlı ve etkin bir şekilde veri aramayı veya Elasticsearch'ü daha iyi anlamayı hedefliyorsanız, bu kurs tam size göre. Katılın ve veri bilimi alanında daha rekabetçi hale gelin. Bu bilgi ve beceriler, sizi veri analitiği projelerinizde daha başarılı kılacak ve sizin için yeni fırsatlar açacaktır.

Cílem tohoto kurzu je, aby každý student získal více sebevědomí tím, že jasně rozpozná rozdíly mezi výrazy, co se pletou, bude schopen dát dohromady celou větu a nebude se bát říct ji nahlas; začít mluvit. Cílem tohoto kurzu je, abyste se rozmluvili a nebáli se. 

Co najdete v tomto kurzu:

  • Každá lekce obsahuje nahrávku MP3 ke stáhnutí do telefonu, na procvičování kdykoliv a kdekoliv

S námi se rozmluvíte!

Okuma alıştırmaları sayesinde İngilizce metinleri anlama becerilerinizi güçlendirebilir, dinleme aktiviteleriyle farklı aksanları daha iyi anlayabilirsiniz. Bu şekilde, İngilizceyi bütüncül bir şekilde öğrenirken, gerçek hayatta da daha etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabileceksiniz.

Kurslarımı hazırlarken amacım, İngilizce'nin sadece bir dil değil, aynı zamanda yeni bir dünya açan bir iletişim aracı olduğunu sizlere göstermekti. İngilizce öğrenmek, yeni insanlarla tanışmak, farklı kültürleri keşfetmek ve daha geniş bir dünya görüşüne sahip olmak demektir. courseDetails.title: Predictive Analytics With Neural Networks in R
courseDetails.shortDescription: Create and train your own neural network in minutes
courseDetails.longDescription:
Neural networks are powerful predictive tools that can be used for almost any machine learning problem with very good results. If you want to break into deep learning and artificial intelligence, learning neural networks is the first crucial step.


This is why I’m inviting you to get into the fascinating world of neural networks. In this course you will develop a strong understanding of one the most utilised network, multilayer perceptron, suitable for both classification and regression problems.


The mathematics behind neural networks is particularly complex, but you don’t need to be a mathematician to take this course and fully benefit from it. Our emphasis here is on practice. You will learn how to operate multilayer perceptrons using the R program, how to build and train models and how to make predictions on new data.


All the procedures are explained live, on real life data sets. So you will advance fast and be able to apply your knowledge immediately.


This course contains three sections.


The first section is dedicated to the basic concepts related to neural networks and predictive analytics. You will find out what multilayer perceptrons are how they learn, what procedure they employ to make predictions. Also, you’ll learn the main prediction accuracy metrics for both numeric and categorical response variables.


In the second section we’ll build and train a multilayer perceptron to predict a bank customers’ default. In other words, our response is categorical in this case. After training the network, we’ll use it to measure prediction accuracy in the test set. But that’s not all. We will also try to improve our model by manipulating various parameters of the network and test our model accuracy using the k-fold cross-validation technique.


In the third section we build and train a model with a numeric response variable. More exactly, we’ll predict car prices depending on their technical features, using a multilayer perceptron, of course. After building the model we’ll measure its accuracy on the test set, try to improve it by modifying he network parameters and, finally, validate our model using the k-fold cross-validation method. So, the same steps as in the previous section, but this time for the particular case of a numeric dependent variable.


A number of practical exercises are proposed at the end of the course. By doing these exercises you’ll actually apply in practice what you have learned.


This course is your opportunity to become familiar with neural networks very fast. With my video lectures, you will find it easy to master these major neural networks and build them in R. Everything is shown live, step by step, so you can replicate any procedure at any time you need it.


So click the “Enroll” button to get instant access to your course. It will surely provide you with new priceless skills. And, who knows, it could enhance your future career.


See you inside!
targetAudiences: R programmers who want to learn data science
Students who want to learn data analysis and science in R

courseDetails.title: Cyber Security Basics
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cyber Security Basics
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the cyber security basics course, a brief introduction to Cyber security, why it is tagged as one of the most important subjects to businesses and Governments and why it is an attractive career choice should you be willing to consider it as a career. Please note this course doesn't teach you to code and is only an introductory course. 


For businesses, cyber security is imperative to routine business activities. In supply chain and operations for instance, cyberthreats have risen to the forefront of supply chain security concerns. Cyberthreats refer to vulnerabilities in IT and software systems, like malware attacks, piracy, unauthorized ERP access and unintentional or maliciously injected backdoors in the purchased, open source or proprietary software used by organizations. Supply chain security here primarily involves minimizing risks from using software developed by another organization, and securing organizational data accessed by another organization in your supply chain. Organizations cannot take for granted that the software that they use or purchase is secure. Because close collaboration is often required between businesses, suppliers and resellers, computer networks may become intertwined or sensitive data shared. This can result in a breach of one organization affecting many. Instead of attacking the target directly, a cybercriminal may attack a weaker organization in the target's supply chain and use that access to meet their goals. Many are responding to recent supply chain attacks such as the SolarWinds attacks by, for example, reducing reliance on foreign suppliers and building primarily domestic supply chains. Some companies are moving production out of foreign factories to domestic ones as well. This course can give a basic protection to devices used to access servers which have been attacked and protect the device.


What you’ll learn - The basic theory and overview of Cyber security

Are there any course requirements or prerequisites - There are absolutely no software or tool needed apart from your usual connection to Udemy through your device

Who this course is for - Beginners, general public, business and IT professionals with an interest in Cyber security
targetAudiences: Students and People interested in Cyber Security. Information Technology and data needs and management is intrinsic to everyday live either as a student, a nurse, a nursery teacher, a bus driver or a director of a company. In our private, public and business lives we are either using a phone, a personal computer or a laptop to get tasks done, communicate with family or check our bank balance on the phone.  Devices used for these need to be secured against various computer viruses including spyware, adware, ransomware and keyloggers. Some simple and basic steps taken to support having basic security for devices to protect against some computer virus which can be extremely harmful and can impede your ability to get through a routine day.

For businesses, cyber security is imperative to routine business activities. In supply chain and operations for instance, cyberthreats have risen to the forefront of supply chain security concerns. Cyberthreats refer to vulnerabilities in IT and software systems, like malware attacks, piracy, unauthorized ERP access and unintentional or maliciously injected backdoors in the purchased, open source or proprietary software used by organizations.  Supply chain security here primarily involves minimizing risks from using software developed by another organization, and securing organizational data accessed by another organization in your supply chain. Organizations cannot take for granted that the software that they use or purchase is secure.  Because close collaboration is often required between businesses, suppliers and resellers, computer networks may become intertwined or sensitive data shared. This can result in a breach of one organization affecting many. Instead of attacking the target directly, a cybercriminal may attack a weaker organization in the target's supply chain and use that access to meet their goals.  Many are responding to recent supply chain attacks such as the SolarWinds attacks by, for example, reducing reliance on foreign suppliers and building primarily domestic supply chains. Some companies are moving production out of foreign factories to domestic ones as well. This course can give a basic protection to devices used to access servers which have been attacked and protect the device.

courseDetails.title: How to Sell Your Book Before You Write It
courseDetails.shortDescription: How to earn royalties from your book idea TODAY — no need to wait until it's published (or even written)
courseDetails.longDescription:
Have a great book idea but don't have the up-front funds to invest in its creation?


You're not alone. One survey found that 81% of people say they want to write a book, yet only 8% of those who said Yes ever followed through.


That's why we created our newest course, "How to Sell Your Book Before You Write the First Word."


This course was designed to help you learn how to pre-sell your book before you even start writing it, and use the revenue to fund the writing process.


In this course, we'll walk you through the step-by-step process of creating the necessary assets to pre-sell your book, including building an email list, creating a landing page, and developing a sales pitch. We'll also share tips on how to validate your book idea and make sure there's a market for it.


You'll learn how to leverage the power of social media to create buzz around your book and build a community of followers who are excited about your book. We'll show you how to entice your current audience, attract a new one, and increase your pre-sales.


By the end of this course, you'll have the tools and knowledge you need to pre-sell your book and fund the writing process. You'll also have a solid understanding of how to build a community around your book and generate buzz before it's even published.


Don't let a lack of resources or uncertainty about your book's marketability hold you back. Enroll in "How to Sell Your Book Before You Write the First Word" today and take the first step toward becoming a successful author!
targetAudiences: Aspiring authors who want to see a return on investment BEFORE they put in the time and work to create their book
